description: During [Cutting Edge](https://attack.mitre.org/campaigns/C0029), threat actors used a Base64-encoded Python script to write a patched version of the Ivanti Connect Secure `dsls` binary.(Citation: Mandiant Cutting Edge Part 2 January 2024)

external_references.description: Lin, M. et al. (2024, January 31). Cutting Edge, Part 2: Investigating Ivanti Connect Secure VPN Zero-Day Exploitation. Retrieved February 27, 2024.
